#summary 基于FudanNLP分词的lucene分析器
#labels Featured,Lucene,Java,Lucene3.0,中文分词,Lucene

= 介绍 =

基于Lucene 3.0.1，扩展了Analyzer类。

{{{
public final class FDAnalyzer extends Analyzer
}}}


= 用法 =
下载[http://fudannlp.googlecode.com/files/fudannlp-lucene-3.0.1-src.zip FDAnalyzer]和[http://fudannlp.googlecode.com/files/fudannlp-0.8-bin.zip FudanNLP]，参考里面demo程序。

* 索引
{{{
Analyzer analyzer = new FDAnalyzer("./model/seg.gz");
IndexWriter writer = new IndexWriter(FSDirectory.open(INDEX_DIR), analyzer , true, IndexWriter.MaxFieldLength.LIMITED);
}}}
* 检索
{{{
Analyzer analyzer = new FDAnalyzer("./model/seg.gz");
QueryParser parser = new QueryParser(Version.LUCENE_30, field, analyzer);
}}}
